Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.normalizer

Class SimpleRegionNormalizer.NormalizerConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.normalizer.SimpleRegionNormalizer.NormalizerConfiguration
Enclosing class:
SimpleRegionNormalizer
private static final class SimpleRegionNormalizer.NormalizerConfiguration extends Object
Holds the configuration values read from Configuration. Encapsulation in a POJO enables atomic hot-reloading of configs without locks.
